ing: 1 fluid ounce raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as ChambordÂ®)
des: "This cocktail is considered the sweeter cousin of the Long Island ice tea. Like that drink, the Grateful Dead cocktail packs a considerable punch!"
ins: Combine tequila, vodka, rum, gin, and raspberry liqueur in a highball glass. Fill with ice and top with sour mix.
